page.title: 08Kingsholm Primary Gloucester
page.content: Kingsholm Junior School was built in 1961 on the site where many narrow streets of houses existed before.In 1973 an infant department was added bringing the number of classrooms to 17,with 2 large halls and a dining hall. Kingsholm Primary School has 340 pupils in 11 classes.A playgroup for pre_school children uses the classroom each morning.Mr.J.H.Townley was headmaster of the school from the beginning until 1981,when he retired and was replaced by Mr.D.P.Bewley. Children at K.P.S. take part in many out_of_class activities, such as sports teams in hockey,football,net_ ball,rounders,athletics,chess, gymnastics and country dancing. Every year children take part in trips and visits to places of interest.Day trips to Bristol Zoo,the
